long_description: The Salomon Trail Twinskin Skort gives you the comfort and coverage you want to run freely over trails and through city streets. Outer skirt and mesh liner shorts are soft, moisture wicking and quick drying; built-in UPF 40 sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Stretchy and breathable waist panel enhances comfort; internal drawcord provides a comfortable fit; zippered pocket holds your house key. The Salomon Trail Twinskin Skort features reflective details for increased visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The Salomon Trail Twinskin Skort gives you the comfort and coverage you want to run freely over trails and through city streets.
